name: Huge Bricks
description:
Huge Bricks is an addictive brick elimination game. This game requires you to launch a ball to eliminate all the bricks to pass the level. Eliminating the bricks may result in items, which will split the ball or generate new balls. You can use the skateboard to bounce the ball, and you can also control the angle of the ball bounce by controlling the position of the skateboard.

Game features:
1. Lots of levels
2. Good looking skin
3. Excellent design
4. Good experience
5. One finger Game

How to play:
1. Move the baffle left and right
2. Choose a good position to launch
3. Wait for the ball to clear the bricks
4. Items drop randomly
5. Catch the props
6. All balls doubled
7. Eliminate all the balls
8. You won!

We are looking forward to getting feedback from all of you! Please leave your reviews, so we can keep making the game even better.
